name: La situation des droits de l'homme au Myanmar/en Birmanie, notamment celle des groupes religieux et ethniques - Human rights situation in Myanmar, including the situation of religious and ethnic groups - Menschenrechtslage in Myanmar, einschließlich der Lage religiöser und ethnischer Gruppen -  - Proposition de résolution (ensemble du texte)
title: Human rights situation in Myanmar, including the situation of religious and ethnic groups
